es.predictia.util.storage

Class StorageServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.predictia.util.storage.StorageServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StorageService

    public class StorageServiceImpl
extends Object
implements StorageService
    Implementation of StorageService with a base folder. After setting setBaseFolder(String), init() must be called in order to start using the service
